Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

So the path so far is A -> RG -> IA -> TI then TC.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then comes step 3 which is a decision based on triage classification. The decision is between CE Comprehensive ECG or FBP Full Blood Panel which is an exclusive choice. So after TC the next step is an XOR between CE and FBP. So that would be XCE FBP.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND

The loop involves Specialist Consultation SC then an exclusive treatment choice between TM or SPT followed by a ReDiagnostic Test RDT which itself is an XOR between FCE or FBA. The loop continues until RDT results are normal. Wait the loop structure in the process trees loop operator requires an A and B. The loop is A is executed then either exit or B and then A again. Wait the loop operator A B means execute A then either exit or execute B then A again. So the loops structure is A followed by a choice between exiting or B followed by A again. So for the problems loop the loops A would be the part that must repeat and B is the step that triggers another iteration.
